name: Doom Wiki - Centered Small Layout
description: This style adds big margins on the left and right sides, putting the content in themiddle of your screen, requiring less eye movement to read it.

user.name: Xane Myers (Xane_MM)
user.about: I'm the developer of Magical Mary 1! I've also created userstyles in the past but I haven't updated them in forever. (They might not work as a result.)

additional_info: • This only affects the non-Wikia wiki as that is the real Doom Wiki.
